ZDNet's review of Norton AntiVirus 2005 /* Reviews */
Putting headings on right level, making headings more neutral. Please restore this version when [[User:Smoothy]] re-re-re-re-re-deletes this. /* Criticisms */
revert. You didn't discuss it before removing it.
Removed criticisms once again, no discussions before putting them back, was there?
added back criticisms, going to get an RFC for this.

Removed whole Criticisms section once again as was placed in during someone's rewrite without permission. Discuss first to obtain valid points on the actual product in question & to make encyclopaedic
/* Criticisms */ added back more. see talk page before removing
added back criticisms. they are valid and without them the article sounds very POV
Removing criticisms, discussions on this section should be made in the Talk pages first.
revert, again, these are valid, see talk page
Removed whole Criticisms section, as it's a blatant flame-bait and really needs to be toned down
replaced cited criticisms - these are valid and sourced complaints, "backed up by facts" if you will
rm unencyclopedic POV notice @ top of page, replace with npov warning
Removed Criticisms flame section. Moderator for this section has reset this already once in the last month. If you want to flame, go start a blog or pay for www.nortonsucks.com. Text doesn't belong
